title: SAPD locates suspect in slaying of 7-year-old in West Side shooting
content:
SAN ANTONIO — SAPD has located capital murder suspect 28-year-old Frank Gomez, wanted in the shooting death of 7-year-old Iris Rodriguez.
Gomez, who allegedly shot Rodriguez and her mother in the 5,000 block of San Fernando just after 10:00 p.m. Wednesday night, is now in police custody.
Rodriguez and her two parents were walking away from Cuellar Park on San Fernando Street near Don Jose when two people opened fire on the family, then drove off in a white car. Police have not identified the second individual.
The child was shot in the head, while her mother, who survived, was hit in the arm.
Investigators said there had been a fight on the Cuellar Park basketball court, but didn't say whether the family was involved.
Crime stoppers were offering up to a $5,000 reward for information that lead to Gomez's arrest.
Staff Writer Jacob Beltran contributed to this report.
